"-- Dropar a tabela se ela já existir
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS teste.cancel_recolhimento;

-- Criar a nova tabela
CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_recolhimento AS
WITH 
-- Lista de CNPJs a serem processados (da tabela teste.cancel_cnpj)
cnpj_base AS (
  SELECT 
    cnpj,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo
  FROM teste.cancel_cnpj
),

-- Consulta para extrair os pagamentos conforme os filtros especificados
pagamentos AS (
  SELECT 
    p.nu_cnpj,
    p.nu_id_pagamento,
    p.vl_total,
    p.nu_per_pagamento,
    p.cd_receita
  FROM usr_sat_ods.vw_ods_pagamento p
  WHERE p.nu_per_pagamento IN (202511, 202510, 202509, 202508, 202507, 202506, 202505, 202504)
    AND p.cd_receita IN (1449, 1465, 1473, 1554, 1570, 1589, 1597, 1600, 1643, 1651, 
                         1716, 1724, 1732, 1740, 1759, 1767, 1783, 1791, 2140, 2496, 
                         2526, 2534, 3000, 3050, 3662, 4383, 7110, 7137, 9687, 9784)
),

-- Agrupar os pagamentos por CNPJ
pagamentos_agrupados AS (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(p.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    COUNT(p.nu_id_pagamento) AS quantidade_pagtos,
    SUM(p.vl_total) AS valor_pagtos
  FROM pagamentos p
  GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(p.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
)

-- Resultado final
SELECT 
  cb.cnpj,
  COALESCE(pa.quantidade_pagtos, 0) AS quantidade_pagtos,
  COALESCE(pa.valor_pagtos, 0) AS valor_pagtos
FROM cnpj_base cb
LEFT JOIN pagamentos_agrupados pa
  ON cb.cnpj_limpo = pa.cnpj_limpo;", "statementsList": ["-- Dropar a tabela se ela já existir

-- Dropar a tabela se ela jÃ¡ existir
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS teste.cancel_recolhimento;

-- Criar a nova tabela
CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_recolhimento AS
WITH 
-- Lista de CNPJs a serem processados (da tabela teste.cancel_cnpj)
cnpj_base AS (
  SELECT 
    cnpj,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo
  FROM teste.cancel_cnpj
),

-- Consulta para extrair os pagamentos conforme os filtros especificados
pagamentos AS (
  SELECT 
    p.nu_cnpj,
    p.nu_id_pagamento,
    p.vl_total,
    p.nu_per_pagamento,
    p.cd_receita
  FROM usr_sat_ods.vw_ods_pagamento p
  WHERE p.nu_per_pagamento IN (202511, 202510, 202509, 202508, 202507, 202506, 202505, 202504)
    AND p.cd_receita IN (1449, 1465, 1473, 1554, 1570, 1589, 1597, 1600, 1643, 1651, 
                         1716, 1724, 1732, 1740, 1759, 1767, 1783, 1791, 2140, 2496, 
                         2526, 2534, 3000, 3050, 3662, 4383, 7110, 7137, 9687, 9784)
),

-- Agrupar os pagamentos por CNPJ
pagamentos_agrupados AS (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(p.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    COUNT(p.nu_id_pagamento) AS quantidade_pagtos,
    SUM(p.vl_total) AS valor_pagtos
  FROM pagamentos p
  GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(p.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
)

-- Resultado final
SELECT 
  cb.cnpj,
  COALESCE(pa.quantidade_pagtos, 0) AS quantidade_pagtos,
  COALESCE(pa.valor_pagtos, 0) AS valor_pagtos
FROM cnpj_base cb
LEFT JOIN pagamentos_agrupados pa
  ON cb.cnpj_limpo = pa.cnpj_limpo;

"isPresentationMode": false, "isPresentationModeInitialized": true, "presentationSnippets": {}, "isHidingCode": false, "snippets": [{"id": "e2e38ab7-3ad7-7c30-1533-eb9cfa6ee231", "name": "", "type": "-- =====================================================================
-- CORREÇÃO FINAL: cancel_zero_normal E cancel_zero_simples
-- =====================================================================
-- 
-- CORREÇÕES APLICADAS:
-- 1. Adicionado COALESCE para tratar NULLs
-- 2. Mantém TODOS os CNPJs do cadastro (não filtra por crédito)
-- 3. Períodos corretos (202101-202509 = 57 períodos)
-- =====================================================================

-- =====================================================================
-- 1. TABELA: cancel_zero_normal (REGIME NORMAL - DIME)
-- =====================================================================
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS teste.cancel_zero_normal;
SET REQUEST_POOL = 'medium';

CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_zero_normal AS
WITH 
-- CNPJs do Regime NORMAL
cnpj_normal AS (
  SELECT 
    cb.cnpj,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    c.nm_reg_apuracao
  FROM teste.cancel_cnpj cb
  LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = 
       REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
  WHERE c.nm_reg_apuracao = 'NORMAL'
),

-- 57 períodos (202101-202509)
periodos AS (
  SELECT periodo 
  FROM (
    SELECT 202101 AS periodo UNION ALL SELECT 202102 UNION ALL SELECT 202103 UNION ALL SELECT 202104 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202105 UNION ALL SELECT 202106 UNION ALL SELECT 202107 UNION ALL SELECT 202108 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202109 UNION ALL SELECT 202110 UNION ALL SELECT 202111 UNION ALL SELECT 202112 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202201 UNION ALL SELECT 202202 UNION ALL SELECT 202203 UNION ALL SELECT 202204 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202205 UNION ALL SELECT 202206 UNION ALL SELECT 202207 UNION ALL SELECT 202208 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202209 UNION ALL SELECT 202210 UNION ALL SELECT 202211 UNION ALL SELECT 202212 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202301 UNION ALL SELECT 202302 UNION ALL SELECT 202303 UNION ALL SELECT 202304 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202305 UNION ALL SELECT 202306 UNION ALL SELECT 202307 UNION ALL SELECT 202308 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202309 UNION ALL SELECT 202310 UNION ALL SELECT 202311 UNION ALL SELECT 202312 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202401 UNION ALL SELECT 202402 UNION ALL SELECT 202403 UNION ALL SELECT 202404 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202405 UNION ALL SELECT 202406 UNION ALL SELECT 202407 UNION ALL SELECT 202408 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202409 UNION ALL SELECT 202410 UNION ALL SELECT 202411 UNION ALL SELECT 202412 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202501 UNION ALL SELECT 202502 UNION ALL SELECT 202503 UNION ALL SELECT 202504 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202505 UNION ALL SELECT 202506 UNION ALL SELECT 202507 UNION ALL SELECT 202508 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202509 UNION ALL SELECT 202510 UNION ALL SELECT 202511
  ) p
),

-- Matriz: CNPJ x Período
matriz_cnpj_periodo AS (
  SELECT 
    cn.cnpj,
    cn.cnpj_limpo,
    cn.nm_reg_apuracao,
    p.periodo
  FROM cnpj_normal cn
  CROSS JOIN periodos p
),

-- Dados DIME com CRITÉRIO CORRIGIDO (COALESCE)
dime_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    NU_CNPJ,
    nu_per_ref AS periodo,
    COALESCE(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA, 0) AS VL_RECEITA_BRUTA,
    COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) AS VL_FATURAMENTO,
    COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) AS VL_TOT_CRED,
    COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) AS VL_TOT_DEB,
    COALESCE(VL_DEB_RECOLHER, 0) AS VL_DEB_RECOLHER,
    -- Critério de declaração zerada (com COALESCE)
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) = 0 THEN 1
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) = 0 AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) = 0 THEN 1
        ELSE 0 
    END AS declaracao_zerada,
    -- Declaração sem movimento (mais restritivo)
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_DEB_RECOLHER, 0) = 0 THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
    END AS declaracao_sem_movimento
  FROM usr_sat_ods.ods_decl_dime_raw
  WHERE nu_per_ref BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
),

-- Estatísticas de omissões e zeradas
estatisticas_normal AS (
  SELECT
    mp.cnpj,
    mp.cnpj_limpo,
    mp.nm_reg_apuracao,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) AS total_periodos,
    COUNT(DISTINCT d.periodo) AS periodos_declarados,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) - COUNT(DISTINCT d.periodo) AS periodos_omissos,
    SUM(COALESCE(d.declaracao_zerada, 0)) AS periodos_zerados,
    SUM(COALESCE(d.declaracao_sem_movimento, 0)) AS periodos_sem_movimento
  FROM matriz_cnpj_periodo mp
  LEFT JOIN dime_dados d
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(d.NU_CNPJ AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = mp.cnpj_limpo
    AND d.periodo = mp.periodo
  GROUP BY mp.cnpj, mp.cnpj_limpo, mp.nm_reg_apuracao
),

-- Agregação de valores DIME
dime_consolidado AS (
  SELECT 
    NU_CNPJ,
    SUM(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA) AS total_vl_receita_bruta,
    SUM(VL_FATURAMENTO) AS total_vl_faturamento,
    SUM(VL_TOT_CRED) AS total_vl_tot_cred,
    SUM(VL_TOT_DEB) AS total_vl_tot_deb,
    SUM(VL_DEB_RECOLHER) AS total_vl_deb_recolher
  FROM dime_dados
  GROUP BY NU_CNPJ
),

-- Dados de NF-e
nfe_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj AS emit_cnpj,
    COUNT(DISTINCT chave) AS total_nfes_emitidas
  FROM nfe.nfe
  WHERE (ano_emissao * 100 + mes_emissao) BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
    AND procnfe.nfe.infnfe.ide.tpnf = 1
  GROUP BY procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj
),

-- Dados de indícios
dados_indicios AS (
  SELECT
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd_indicio) AS qtde_indicios,
    SUM(COALESCE(nu_score, 0)) AS soma_score_indicios,
    MAX(CASE WHEN cd_indicio = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS flag_omissao_dime
  FROM neaf.empresa_indicio
  WHERE cd_uf = 'SC'
    AND cd_atual = 1
  GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
)

SELECT
  c.nm_contador,
  c.nu_cnpj,
  c.nm_razao_social,
  c.nm_fantasia,
  c.nm_reg_apuracao,
  en.cnpj AS cnpj_base,
  
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_faturamento, 0) AS total_vl_faturamento,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_receita_bruta, 0) AS total_vl_receita_bruta,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_tot_cred, 0) AS total_vl_tot_cred,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_tot_deb, 0) AS total_vl_tot_deb,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_deb_recolher, 0) AS total_vl_deb_recolher,
  
  COALESCE(nfi.total_nfes_emitidas, 0) AS nfes_emitidas_normal,
  
  COALESCE(en.periodos_omissos, 0) AS periodos_omissos,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_zerados, 0) AS periodos_zerados,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_sem_movimento, 0) AS periodos_sem_movimento,
  COALESCE(en.total_periodos, 0) AS total_periodos,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_declarados, 0) AS periodos_declarados,
  
  COALESCE(di.qtde_indicios, 0) AS qtde_indicios_fraude,
  COALESCE(di.soma_score_indicios, 0) AS soma_score_indicios,
  COALESCE(di.flag_omissao_dime, 0) AS flag_omissao_dime_indicio
  
FROM estatisticas_normal en
LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dime_consolidado d
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(d.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN nfe_dados nfi
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nfi.emit_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dados_indicios di
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = di.cnpj_limpo;


-- =====================================================================
-- 2. TABELA: cancel_zero_simples (SIMPLES NACIONAL - PGDAS)
-- =====================================================================
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS teste.cancel_zero_simples;

CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_zero_simples AS
WITH 
cnpj_simples AS (
  SELECT 
    cb.cnpj,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    c.nm_reg_apuracao
  FROM teste.cancel_cnpj cb
  LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = 
       REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
  WHERE c.nm_reg_apuracao IN ('SIMPLES NACIONAL', 'SIMEI', 'SIMPLES SC')
),

periodos AS (
  SELECT periodo 
  FROM (
    SELECT 202101 AS periodo UNION ALL SELECT 202102 UNION ALL SELECT 202103 UNION ALL SELECT 202104 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202105 UNION ALL SELECT 202106 UNION ALL SELECT 202107 UNION ALL SELECT 202108 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202109 UNION ALL SELECT 202110 UNION ALL SELECT 202111 UNION ALL SELECT 202112 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202201 UNION ALL SELECT 202202 UNION ALL SELECT 202203 UNION ALL SELECT 202204 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202205 UNION ALL SELECT 202206 UNION ALL SELECT 202207 UNION ALL SELECT 202208 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202209 UNION ALL SELECT 202210 UNION ALL SELECT 202211 UNION ALL SELECT 202212 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202301 UNION ALL SELECT 202302 UNION ALL SELECT 202303 UNION ALL SELECT 202304 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202305 UNION ALL SELECT 202306 UNION ALL SELECT 202307 UNION ALL SELECT 202308 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202309 UNION ALL SELECT 202310 UNION ALL SELECT 202311 UNION ALL SELECT 202312 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202401 UNION ALL SELECT 202402 UNION ALL SELECT 202403 UNION ALL SELECT 202404 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202405 UNION ALL SELECT 202406 UNION ALL SELECT 202407 UNION ALL SELECT 202408 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202409 UNION ALL SELECT 202410 UNION ALL SELECT 202411 UNION ALL SELECT 202412 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202501 UNION ALL SELECT 202502 UNION ALL SELECT 202503 UNION ALL SELECT 202504 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202505 UNION ALL SELECT 202506 UNION ALL SELECT 202507 UNION ALL SELECT 202508 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202509 UNION ALL SELECT 202510 UNION ALL SELECT 202511
  ) p
),

matriz_cnpj_periodo AS (
  SELECT 
    cs.cnpj,
    cs.cnpj_limpo,
    cs.nm_reg_apuracao,
    p.periodo
  FROM cnpj_simples cs
  CROSS JOIN periodos p
),

sn_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    nu_cnpj_matriz AS nu_cnpj,
    nu_per_ref AS periodo,
    COALESCE(vl_rec_bruta, 0) AS vl_rec_bruta,
    COALESCE(vl_rec_bruta_em_12m, 0) AS vl_rec_bruta_em_12m,
    COALESCE(vl_rec_bruta_no_ano, 0) AS vl_rec_bruta_no_ano,
    COALESCE(vl_icms_sc, 0) AS vl_icms_sc,
    CASE WHEN COALESCE(vl_rec_bruta, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS declaracao_zerada
  FROM usr_sat_ods.vw_sna_pgdasd_grupo_empresarial
  WHERE nu_per_ref BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
),

estatisticas_simples AS (
  SELECT
    mp.cnpj,
    mp.cnpj_limpo,
    mp.nm_reg_apuracao,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) AS total_periodos,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.periodo) AS periodos_declarados,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) - COUNT(DISTINCT s.periodo) AS periodos_omissos,
    SUM(COALESCE(s.declaracao_zerada, 0)) AS periodos_zerados
  FROM matriz_cnpj_periodo mp
  LEFT JOIN sn_dados s
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(s.NU_CNPJ AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = mp.cnpj_limpo
    AND s.periodo = mp.periodo
  GROUP BY mp.cnpj, mp.cnpj_limpo, mp.nm_reg_apuracao
),

sn_consolidado AS (
  SELECT 
    nu_cnpj,
    SUM(vl_rec_bruta) AS total_vl_rec_bruta,
    MAX(vl_rec_bruta_em_12m) AS max_vl_rec_bruta_em_12m,
    SUM(vl_rec_bruta_no_ano) AS total_vl_rec_bruta_no_ano,
    SUM(vl_icms_sc) AS total_vl_icms_sc
  FROM sn_dados
  GROUP BY nu_cnpj
),

nfe_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj AS emit_cnpj,
    COUNT(DISTINCT chave) AS total_nfes_emitidas
  FROM nfe.nfe
  WHERE (ano_emissao * 100 + mes_emissao) BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
    AND procnfe.nfe.infnfe.ide.tpnf = 1
  GROUP BY procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj
),

dados_indicios AS (
  SELECT
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd_indicio) AS qtde_indicios,
    SUM(COALESCE(nu_score, 0)) AS soma_score_indicios,
    MAX(CASE WHEN cd_indicio = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS flag_omissao_pgdas
  FROM neaf.empresa_indicio
  WHERE cd_uf = 'SC'
    AND cd_atual = 1
  GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
)

SELECT
  c.nm_contador,
  c.nu_cnpj,
  c.nm_razao_social,
  c.nm_fantasia,
  c.nm_reg_apuracao,
  es.cnpj AS cnpj_base,

-- 1. Adicionado COALESCE para tratar NULLs

-- =====================================================================
-- 1. TABELA: cancel_zero_normal (REGIME NORMAL - DIME)
-- =====================================================================
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS teste.cancel_zero_normal;", "
SET REQUEST_POOL = 'medium';", "

CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_zero_normal AS
WITH 
-- CNPJs do Regime NORMAL
cnpj_normal AS (
  SELECT 
    cb.cnpj,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    c.nm_reg_apuracao
  FROM teste.cancel_cnpj cb
  LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = 
       REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
  WHERE c.nm_reg_apuracao = 'NORMAL'
),

-- 57 períodos (202101-202509)
periodos AS (
  SELECT periodo 
  FROM (
    SELECT 202101 AS periodo UNION ALL SELECT 202102 UNION ALL SELECT 202103 UNION ALL SELECT 202104 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202105 UNION ALL SELECT 202106 UNION ALL SELECT 202107 UNION ALL SELECT 202108 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202109 UNION ALL SELECT 202110 UNION ALL SELECT 202111 UNION ALL SELECT 202112 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202201 UNION ALL SELECT 202202 UNION ALL SELECT 202203 UNION ALL SELECT 202204 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202205 UNION ALL SELECT 202206 UNION ALL SELECT 202207 UNION ALL SELECT 202208 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202209 UNION ALL SELECT 202210 UNION ALL SELECT 202211 UNION ALL SELECT 202212 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202301 UNION ALL SELECT 202302 UNION ALL SELECT 202303 UNION ALL SELECT 202304 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202305 UNION ALL SELECT 202306 UNION ALL SELECT 202307 UNION ALL SELECT 202308 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202309 UNION ALL SELECT 202310 UNION ALL SELECT 202311 UNION ALL SELECT 202312 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202401 UNION ALL SELECT 202402 UNION ALL SELECT 202403 UNION ALL SELECT 202404 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202405 UNION ALL SELECT 202406 UNION ALL SELECT 202407 UNION ALL SELECT 202408 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202409 UNION ALL SELECT 202410 UNION ALL SELECT 202411 UNION ALL SELECT 202412 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202501 UNION ALL SELECT 202502 UNION ALL SELECT 202503 UNION ALL SELECT 202504 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202505 UNION ALL SELECT 202506 UNION ALL SELECT 202507 UNION ALL SELECT 202508 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202509 UNION ALL SELECT 202510 UNION ALL SELECT 202511
  ) p
),

-- Matriz: CNPJ x Período
matriz_cnpj_periodo AS (
  SELECT 
    cn.cnpj,
    cn.cnpj_limpo,
    cn.nm_reg_apuracao,
    p.periodo
  FROM cnpj_normal cn
  CROSS JOIN periodos p
),

-- Dados DIME com CRITÉRIO CORRIGIDO (COALESCE)
dime_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    NU_CNPJ,
    nu_per_ref AS periodo,
    COALESCE(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA, 0) AS VL_RECEITA_BRUTA,
    COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) AS VL_FATURAMENTO,
    COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) AS VL_TOT_CRED,
    COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) AS VL_TOT_DEB,
    COALESCE(VL_DEB_RECOLHER, 0) AS VL_DEB_RECOLHER,
    -- Critério de declaração zerada (com COALESCE)
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) = 0 THEN 1
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) = 0 AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) = 0 THEN 1
        ELSE 0 
    END AS declaracao_zerada,
    -- Declaração sem movimento (mais restritivo)
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_DEB_RECOLHER, 0) = 0 THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
    END AS declaracao_sem_movimento
  FROM usr_sat_ods.ods_decl_dime_raw
  WHERE nu_per_ref BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
),

-- Estatísticas de omissões e zeradas
estatisticas_normal AS (
  SELECT
    mp.cnpj,
    mp.cnpj_limpo,
    mp.nm_reg_apuracao,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) AS total_periodos,
    COUNT(DISTINCT d.periodo) AS periodos_declarados,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) - COUNT(DISTINCT d.periodo) AS periodos_omissos,
    SUM(COALESCE(d.declaracao_zerada, 0)) AS periodos_zerados,
    SUM(COALESCE(d.declaracao_sem_movimento, 0)) AS periodos_sem_movimento
  FROM matriz_cnpj_periodo mp
  LEFT JOIN dime_dados d
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(d.NU_CNPJ AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = mp.cnpj_limpo
    AND d.periodo = mp.periodo
  GROUP BY mp.cnpj, mp.cnpj_limpo, mp.nm_reg_apuracao
),

-- Agregação de valores DIME
dime_consolidado AS (
  SELECT 
    NU_CNPJ,
    SUM(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA) AS total_vl_receita_bruta,
    SUM(VL_FATURAMENTO) AS total_vl_faturamento,
    SUM(VL_TOT_CRED) AS total_vl_tot_cred,
    SUM(VL_TOT_DEB) AS total_vl_tot_deb,
    SUM(VL_DEB_RECOLHER) AS total_vl_deb_recolher
  FROM dime_dados
  GROUP BY NU_CNPJ
),

-- Dados de NF-e
nfe_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj AS emit_cnpj,
    COUNT(DISTINCT chave) AS total_nfes_emitidas
  FROM nfe.nfe
  WHERE (ano_emissao * 100 + mes_emissao) BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
    AND procnfe.nfe.infnfe.ide.tpnf = 1
  GROUP BY procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj
),

-- Dados de indícios
dados_indicios AS (
  SELECT
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd_indicio) AS qtde_indicios,
    SUM(COALESCE(nu_score, 0)) AS soma_score_indicios,
    MAX(CASE WHEN cd_indicio = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS flag_omissao_dime
  FROM neaf.empresa_indicio
  WHERE cd_uf = 'SC'
    AND cd_atual = 1
  GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
)

SELECT
  c.nm_contador,
  c.nu_cnpj,
  c.nm_razao_social,
  c.nm_fantasia,
  c.nm_reg_apuracao,
  en.cnpj AS cnpj_base,
  
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_faturamento, 0) AS total_vl_faturamento,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_receita_bruta, 0) AS total_vl_receita_bruta,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_tot_cred, 0) AS total_vl_tot_cred,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_tot_deb, 0) AS total_vl_tot_deb,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_deb_recolher, 0) AS total_vl_deb_recolher,
  
  COALESCE(nfi.total_nfes_emitidas, 0) AS nfes_emitidas_normal,
  
  COALESCE(en.periodos_omissos, 0) AS periodos_omissos,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_zerados, 0) AS periodos_zerados,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_sem_movimento, 0) AS periodos_sem_movimento,
  COALESCE(en.total_periodos, 0) AS total_periodos,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_declarados, 0) AS periodos_declarados,
  
  COALESCE(di.qtde_indicios, 0) AS qtde_indicios_fraude,
  COALESCE(di.soma_score_indicios, 0) AS soma_score_indicios,
  COALESCE(di.flag_omissao_dime, 0) AS flag_omissao_dime_indicio
  
FROM estatisticas_normal en
LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dime_consolidado d
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(d.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN nfe_dados nfi
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nfi.emit_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dados_indicios di
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = di.cnpj_limpo;", "

-- Agregação de valores DIME
dime_consolidado AS (
  SELECT 
    NU_CNPJ,
    SUM(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA) AS total_vl_receita_bruta,
    SUM(VL_FATURAMENTO) AS total_vl_faturamento,
    SUM(VL_TOT_CRED) AS total_vl_tot_cred,
    SUM(VL_TOT_DEB) AS total_vl_tot_deb,
    SUM(VL_DEB_RECOLHER) AS total_vl_deb_recolher
  FROM dime_dados
  GROUP BY NU_CNPJ
),

-- Dados de NF-e
nfe_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj AS emit_cnpj,
    COUNT(DISTINCT chave) AS total_nfes_emitidas
  FROM nfe.nfe
  WHERE (ano_emissao * 100 + mes_emissao) BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
    AND procnfe.nfe.infnfe.ide.tpnf = 1
  GROUP BY procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj
),

-- Dados de indícios
dados_indicios AS (
  SELECT
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd_indicio) AS qtde_indicios,
    SUM(COALESCE(nu_score, 0)) AS soma_score_indicios,
    MAX(CASE WHEN cd_indicio = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS flag_omissao_dime
  FROM neaf.empresa_indicio
  WHERE cd_uf = 'SC'
    AND cd_atual = 1
  GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
)

SELECT
  c.nm_contador,
  c.nu_cnpj,
  c.nm_razao_social,
  c.nm_fantasia,
  c.nm_reg_apuracao,
  en.cnpj AS cnpj_base,
  
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_faturamento, 0) AS total_vl_faturamento,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_receita_bruta, 0) AS total_vl_receita_bruta,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_tot_cred, 0) AS total_vl_tot_cred,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_tot_deb, 0) AS total_vl_tot_deb,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_deb_recolher, 0) AS total_vl_deb_recolher,
  
  COALESCE(nfi.total_nfes_emitidas, 0) AS nfes_emitidas_normal,
  
  COALESCE(en.periodos_omissos, 0) AS periodos_omissos,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_zerados, 0) AS periodos_zerados,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_sem_movimento, 0) AS periodos_sem_movimento,
  COALESCE(en.total_periodos, 0) AS total_periodos,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_declarados, 0) AS periodos_declarados,
  
  COALESCE(di.qtde_indicios, 0) AS qtde_indicios_fraude,
  COALESCE(di.soma_score_indicios, 0) AS soma_score_indicios,
  COALESCE(di.flag_omissao_dime, 0) AS flag_omissao_dime_indicio
  
FROM estatisticas_normal en
LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dime_consolidado d
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(d.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN nfe_dados nfi
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nfi.emit_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dados_indicios di
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = di.cnpj_limpo;

  FROM usr_sat_ods.vw_sna_pgdasd_grupo_empresarial
  WHERE nu_per_ref BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
),

estatisticas_simples AS (
  SELECT
    mp.cnpj,

    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(s.NU_CNPJ AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = mp.cnpj_limpo
    AND s.periodo = mp.periodo

cnpj_normal AS (

),

    SELECT 202205 UNION ALL SELECT 202206 UNION ALL SELECT 202207 UNION ALL SELECT 202208 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202209 UNION ALL SELECT 202210 UNION ALL SELECT 202211 UNION ALL SELECT 202212 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202301 UNION ALL SELECT 202302 UNION ALL SELECT 202303 UNION ALL SELECT 202304 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202305 UNION ALL SELECT 202306 UNION ALL SELECT 202307 UNION ALL SELECT 202308 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202309 UNION ALL SELECT 202310 UNION ALL SELECT 202311 UNION ALL SELECT 202312 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202401 UNION ALL SELECT 202402 UNION ALL SELECT 202403 UNION ALL SELECT 202404 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202405 UNION ALL SELECT 202406 UNION ALL SELECT 202407 UNION ALL SELECT 202408 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202409 UNION ALL SELECT 202410 UNION ALL SELECT 202411 UNION ALL SELECT 202412 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202501 UNION ALL SELECT 202502 UNION ALL SELECT 202503 UNION ALL SELECT 202504 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202505 UNION ALL SELECT 202506 UNION ALL SELECT 202507 UNION ALL SELECT 202508 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202509 UNION ALL SELECT 202510 UNION ALL SELECT 202511
  ) p
),

-- Matriz: CNPJ x Período
matriz_cnpj_periodo AS (
  SELECT 
    cn.cnpj,
    cn.cnpj_limpo,
    cn.nm_reg_apuracao,
    p.periodo
  FROM cnpj_normal cn
  CROSS JOIN periodos p
),

-- Dados DIME com CRITÉRIO CORRIGIDO (COALESCE)
dime_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    NU_CNPJ,
    nu_per_ref AS periodo,
    COALESCE(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA, 0) AS VL_RECEITA_BRUTA,
    COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) AS VL_FATURAMENTO,
    COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) AS VL_TOT_CRED,
    COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) AS VL_TOT_DEB,
    COALESCE(VL_DEB_RECOLHER, 0) AS VL_DEB_RECOLHER,
    -- Critério de declaração zerada (com COALESCE)
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) = 0 THEN 1
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) = 0 AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) = 0 THEN 1
        ELSE 0 
    END AS declaracao_zerada,
    -- Declaração sem movimento (mais restritivo)
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_FATURAMENTO, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_CRED, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_TOT_DEB, 0) = 0 
             AND COALESCE(VL_DEB_RECOLHER, 0) = 0 THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
    END AS declaracao_sem_movimento
  FROM usr_sat_ods.ods_decl_dime_raw
  WHERE nu_per_ref BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
),

-- Estatísticas de omissões e zeradas
estatisticas_normal AS (
  SELECT
    mp.cnpj,
    mp.cnpj_limpo,
    mp.nm_reg_apuracao,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) AS total_periodos,
    COUNT(DISTINCT d.periodo) AS periodos_declarados,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) - COUNT(DISTINCT d.periodo) AS periodos_omissos,
    SUM(COALESCE(d.declaracao_zerada, 0)) AS periodos_zerados,
    SUM(COALESCE(d.declaracao_sem_movimento, 0)) AS periodos_sem_movimento
  FROM matriz_cnpj_periodo mp
  LEFT JOIN dime_dados d
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(d.NU_CNPJ AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = mp.cnpj_limpo
    AND d.periodo = mp.periodo
  GROUP BY mp.cnpj, mp.cnpj_limpo, mp.nm_reg_apuracao
),

-- Agregação de valores DIME
dime_consolidado AS (
  SELECT 
    NU_CNPJ,
    SUM(VL_RECEITA_BRUTA) AS total_vl_receita_bruta,
    SUM(VL_FATURAMENTO) AS total_vl_faturamento,
    SUM(VL_TOT_CRED) AS total_vl_tot_cred,
    SUM(VL_TOT_DEB) AS total_vl_tot_deb,
    SUM(VL_DEB_RECOLHER) AS total_vl_deb_recolher
  FROM dime_dados
  GROUP BY NU_CNPJ
),

-- Dados de NF-e
nfe_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj AS emit_cnpj,
    COUNT(DISTINCT chave) AS total_nfes_emitidas
  FROM nfe.nfe
  WHERE (ano_emissao * 100 + mes_emissao) BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
    AND procnfe.nfe.infnfe.ide.tpnf = 1
  GROUP BY procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj
),

-- Dados de indícios
dados_indicios AS (
  SELECT
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd_indicio) AS qtde_indicios,
    SUM(COALESCE(nu_score, 0)) AS soma_score_indicios,
    MAX(CASE WHEN cd_indicio = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS flag_omissao_dime
  FROM neaf.empresa_indicio
  WHERE cd_uf = 'SC'
    AND cd_atual = 1
  GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
)

SELECT
  c.nm_contador,
  c.nu_cnpj,
  c.nm_razao_social,
  c.nm_fantasia,
  c.nm_reg_apuracao,
  en.cnpj AS cnpj_base,
  
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_faturamento, 0) AS total_vl_faturamento,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_receita_bruta, 0) AS total_vl_receita_bruta,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_tot_cred, 0) AS total_vl_tot_cred,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_tot_deb, 0) AS total_vl_tot_deb,
  COALESCE(d.total_vl_deb_recolher, 0) AS total_vl_deb_recolher,
  
  COALESCE(nfi.total_nfes_emitidas, 0) AS nfes_emitidas_normal,
  
  COALESCE(en.periodos_omissos, 0) AS periodos_omissos,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_zerados, 0) AS periodos_zerados,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_sem_movimento, 0) AS periodos_sem_movimento,
  COALESCE(en.total_periodos, 0) AS total_periodos,
  COALESCE(en.periodos_declarados, 0) AS periodos_declarados,
  
  COALESCE(di.qtde_indicios, 0) AS qtde_indicios_fraude,
  COALESCE(di.soma_score_indicios, 0) AS soma_score_indicios,
  COALESCE(di.flag_omissao_dime, 0) AS flag_omissao_dime_indicio
  
FROM estatisticas_normal en
LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dime_consolidado d
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(d.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN nfe_dados nfi
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nfi.emit_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dados_indicios di
  ON en.cnpj_limpo = di.cnpj_limpo;


-- =====================================================================
-- 2. TABELA: cancel_zero_simples (SIMPLES NACIONAL - PGDAS)
-- =====================================================================
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS teste.cancel_zero_simples;

CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_zero_simples AS
WITH 
cnpj_simples AS (
  SELECT 
    cb.cnpj,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    c.nm_reg_apuracao
  FROM teste.cancel_cnpj cb
  LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = 
       REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
  WHERE c.nm_reg_apuracao IN ('SIMPLES NACIONAL', 'SIMEI', 'SIMPLES SC')
),

periodos AS (
  SELECT periodo 
  FROM (
    SELECT 202101 AS periodo UNION ALL SELECT 202102 UNION ALL SELECT 202103 UNION ALL SELECT 202104 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202105 UNION ALL SELECT 202106 UNION ALL SELECT 202107 UNION ALL SELECT 202108 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202109 UNION ALL SELECT 202110 UNION ALL SELECT 202111 UNION ALL SELECT 202112 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202201 UNION ALL SELECT 202202 UNION ALL SELECT 202203 UNION ALL SELECT 202204 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202205 UNION ALL SELECT 202206 UNION ALL SELECT 202207 UNION ALL SELECT 202208 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202209 UNION ALL SELECT 202210 UNION ALL SELECT 202211 UNION ALL SELECT 202212 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202301 UNION ALL SELECT 202302 UNION ALL SELECT 202303 UNION ALL SELECT 202304 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202305 UNION ALL SELECT 202306 UNION ALL SELECT 202307 UNION ALL SELECT 202308 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202309 UNION ALL SELECT 202310 UNION ALL SELECT 202311 UNION ALL SELECT 202312 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202401 UNION ALL SELECT 202402 UNION ALL SELECT 202403 UNION ALL SELECT 202404 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202405 UNION ALL SELECT 202406 UNION ALL SELECT 202407 UNION ALL SELECT 202408 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202409 UNION ALL SELECT 202410 UNION ALL SELECT 202411 UNION ALL SELECT 202412 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202501 UNION ALL SELECT 202502 UNION ALL SELECT 202503 UNION ALL SELECT 202504 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202505 UNION ALL SELECT 202506 UNION ALL SELECT 202507 UNION ALL SELECT 202508 UNION ALL
    SELECT 202509 UNION ALL SELECT 202510 UNION ALL SELECT 202511
  ) p
),

matriz_cnpj_periodo AS (
  SELECT 
    cs.cnpj,
    cs.cnpj_limpo,
    cs.nm_reg_apuracao,
    p.periodo
  FROM cnpj_simples cs
  CROSS JOIN periodos p
),

sn_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    nu_cnpj_matriz AS nu_cnpj,
    nu_per_ref AS periodo,
    COALESCE(vl_rec_bruta, 0) AS vl_rec_bruta,
    COALESCE(vl_rec_bruta_em_12m, 0) AS vl_rec_bruta_em_12m,
    COALESCE(vl_rec_bruta_no_ano, 0) AS vl_rec_bruta_no_ano,
    COALESCE(vl_icms_sc, 0) AS vl_icms_sc,
    CASE WHEN COALESCE(vl_rec_bruta, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS declaracao_zerada
  FROM usr_sat_ods.vw_sna_pgdasd_grupo_empresarial
  WHERE nu_per_ref BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
),

estatisticas_simples AS (
  SELECT
    mp.cnpj,
    mp.cnpj_limpo,
    mp.nm_reg_apuracao,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) AS total_periodos,
    COUNT(DISTINCT s.periodo) AS periodos_declarados,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mp.periodo) - COUNT(DISTINCT s.periodo) AS periodos_omissos,
    SUM(COALESCE(s.declaracao_zerada, 0)) AS periodos_zerados
  FROM matriz_cnpj_periodo mp
  LEFT JOIN sn_dados s
    ON REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(s.NU_CNPJ AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = mp.cnpj_limpo
    AND s.periodo = mp.periodo
  GROUP BY mp.cnpj, mp.cnpj_limpo, mp.nm_reg_apuracao
),

sn_consolidado AS (
  SELECT 
    nu_cnpj,
    SUM(vl_rec_bruta) AS total_vl_rec_bruta,
    MAX(vl_rec_bruta_em_12m) AS max_vl_rec_bruta_em_12m,
    SUM(vl_rec_bruta_no_ano) AS total_vl_rec_bruta_no_ano,
    SUM(vl_icms_sc) AS total_vl_icms_sc
  FROM sn_dados
  GROUP BY nu_cnpj
),

nfe_dados AS (
  SELECT 
    procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj AS emit_cnpj,
    COUNT(DISTINCT chave) AS total_nfes_emitidas
  FROM nfe.nfe
  WHERE (ano_emissao * 100 + mes_emissao) BETWEEN 202101 AND 202511
    AND procnfe.nfe.infnfe.ide.tpnf = 1
  GROUP BY procnfe.nfe.infnfe.emit.cnpj
),

dados_indicios AS (
  SELECT
    REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') AS cnpj_limpo,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd_indicio) AS qtde_indicios,
    SUM(COALESCE(nu_score, 0)) AS soma_score_indicios,
    MAX(CASE WHEN cd_indicio = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS flag_omissao_pgdas
  FROM neaf.empresa_indicio
  WHERE cd_uf = 'SC'
    AND cd_atual = 1
  GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nu_cpf_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
)

SELECT
  c.nm_contador,
  c.nu_cnpj,
  c.nm_razao_social,
  c.nm_fantasia,
  c.nm_reg_apuracao,
  es.cnpj AS cnpj_base,
  
  COALESCE(sn.total_vl_rec_bruta, 0) AS total_vl_rec_bruta,
  COALESCE(sn.max_vl_rec_bruta_em_12m, 0) AS max_vl_rec_bruta_em_12m,
  COALESCE(sn.total_vl_rec_bruta_no_ano, 0) AS total_vl_rec_bruta_no_ano,
  COALESCE(sn.total_vl_icms_sc, 0) AS total_vl_icms_sc,
  
  COALESCE(nfi.total_nfes_emitidas, 0) AS nfes_emitidas_simples,
  
  COALESCE(es.periodos_omissos, 0) AS periodos_omissos,
  COALESCE(es.periodos_zerados, 0) AS periodos_zerados,
  COALESCE(es.total_periodos, 0) AS total_periodos,
  COALESCE(es.periodos_declarados, 0) AS periodos_declarados,
  
  COALESCE(di.qtde_indicios, 0) AS qtde_indicios_fraude,
  COALESCE(di.soma_score_indicios, 0) AS soma_score_indicios,
  COALESCE(di.flag_omissao_pgdas, 0) AS flag_omissao_pgdas_indicio
  
FROM estatisticas_simples es
LEFT JOIN usr_sat_ods.vw_cad_contrib c
  ON es.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(c.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN sn_consolidado sn
  ON es.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(sn.nu_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN nfe_dados nfi
  ON es.cnpj_limpo = REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(nfi.emit_cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
LEFT JOIN dados_indicios di
  ON es.cnpj_limpo = di.cnpj_limpo;", "lastExecutedSelectionRange": {"start": {"row": 0, "column": 0}, "end": {"row": 329, "column": 35}}, "formatEnabled": true, "isFetchingData": false, "isCanceling": false, "aceAutoExpand": false, "lastCheckStatusRequest": {"readyState": 4, "responseText": "{"status": 0, "query_status": {"status": "available"}}", "responseJSON": {"status": 0, "query_status": {"status": "available"}}, "status": 200, "statusText": "OK"}, "lastGetLogsRequest": {"readyState": 4, "responseText": "{"status": 0, "logs": "Query c341739b8dd8b4a1:419bd77b00000000 100% Complete (20029 out of 20029)", "progress": 100, "jobs": [{"name": "c341739b8dd8b4a1:419bd77b00000000", "url": "/hue/jobbrowser#!id=c341739b8dd8b4a1:419bd77b00000000", "started": true, "finished": false, "percentJob": 100}], "isFullLogs": false}", "responseJSON": {"status": 0, "logs": "Query c341739b8dd8b4a1:419bd77b00000000 100% Complete (20029 out of 20029)", "progress": 100, "jobs": [{"name": "c341739b8dd8b4a1:419bd77b00000000", "url": "/hue/jobbrowser#!id=c341739b8dd8b4a1:419bd77b00000000", "started": true, "finished": false, "percentJob": 100}], "isFullLogs": false}, "status": 200, "statusText": "OK"}}], "selectedSnippet": "impala", "creatingSessionLocks": [], "sessions": [], "directoryUuid": "", "dependentsCoordinator": [], "historyFilter": "", "historyFilterVisible": false, "loadingHistory": false, "historyInitialHeight": 10320, "forceHistoryInitialHeight": false, "historyCurrentPage": 1, "historyTotalPages": 224, "schedulerViewModel": null, "schedulerViewModelIsLoaded": false, "isBatchable": true, "isExecutingAll": false, "executingAllIndex": 0, "retryModalConfirm": null, "retryModalCancel": null, "canSave": true, "unloaded": false, "updateHistoryFailed": false, "viewSchedulerId": "", "loadingScheduler": false, "is_history": false}

CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_suspeitas AS
SELECT

    s.nm_munic_na_conf,
    s.cd_uf_na_conf,
    s.nu_cep_na_conf,
    s.tx_referencia_na_conf,

    s.cd_evento_suspensao_dfe,

    s.cd_situacao_suspeita,

    s.sn_cancelado_inex_inativ,
    s.dt_inicio_protoc_cancelamento,
    s.tx_obs_situacao_suspeita,
    s.nu_score,
    s.tp_variacao_score,
    s.nu_score_ia,
    s.tp_variacao_score_ia,
    s.qt_motivos,
    s.cd_usuario_responsavel,
    s.dt_associacao_responsavel,
    s.qt_meses_valores,
    s.nu_per_inicial_valores,
    s.nu_per_final_valores,
    s.vl_total_nfes_saida,
    s.vl_total_icms_nfes_saida,
    s.vl_total_nfes_entrada,
    s.vl_total_icms_nfes_entrada,
    s.vl_total_arrecadacao_grupo,
    s.id_setor_suspeito,
    s.nu_per_ref_ini_vl_total_imp,
    s.nu_per_ref_fim_vl_total_imp,
    s.vl_total_imp_como_importador,
    s.vl_total_imp_como_adquirente,
    s.dt_processamento_big_data,
    s.dt_inclusao AS dt_inclusao_suspeita,
    s.dt_alteracao AS dt_alteracao_suspeita,
    s.cd_usuario_alteracao,
    s.sn_situacao_fiscal_ccc,
    s.cd_tipo_confirmacao_anterior,
    s.dt_confirmacao_anterior,
    s.dt_reversao_confirmacao,
    s.nm_fantasia_na_conf,
    s.sn_salvou_telefones_na_conf,
    s.nu_telefone_na_conf,

FROM teste.cancel_cadastro c
JOIN usr_sat_auditoria.aud_empresa_sob_suspeita s
    ON c.cnpj = s.nu_cnpj;", "statementsList": ["--SELECT

    ei.cd_indicio,
    ei.nu_score AS score_indicio,
    ei.valid_from AS dt_inicio_validade,

    ei.cd_atual,

    teste.cancel_cnpj c

    neaf.indicio ind ON ei.cd_indicio = ind.cd_indicio

    ei.cd_atual = 1;", "statementsList": ["-- Exclui a tabela de resultados, caso ela já exista.

-- Cria a tabela de resultados SEM a coluna complexa.
CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_suspeitas_score AS

    c.cnpj,
    ei.cd_uf,

    ei.valid_to AS dt_fim_validade,
    ei.cd_atual,
    -- A coluna ei.indicio_complemento foi removida daqui
    ind.tx_descricao_indicio
FROM
    teste.cancel_cnpj c
JOIN
    neaf.empresa_indicio ei ON c.cnpj = ei.nu_cpf_cnpj
JOIN

-- Exclui a tabela de resultados, caso ela jÃ¡ exista.
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS teste.cancel_suspeitas_score;

-- Cria a tabela de resultados SEM a coluna complexa.
CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_suspeitas_score AS
SELECT
    c.cnpj,
    ei.cd_uf,
    ei.cd_indicio,
    ei.nu_score AS score_indicio,
    ei.valid_from AS dt_inicio_validade,
    ei.valid_to AS dt_fim_validade,
    ei.cd_atual,
    -- A coluna ei.indicio_complemento foi removida daqui
    ind.tx_descricao_indicio
FROM
    teste.cancel_cnpj c
JOIN
    neaf.empresa_indicio ei ON c.cnpj = ei.nu_cpf_cnpj
JOIN
    neaf.indicio ind ON ei.cd_indicio = ind.cd_indicio
WHERE
    ei.cd_atual = 1;

"associatedDocumentUuid": null, "statement_raw": "-- Remover a tabela final se existir
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS teste.cancel_final;

-- Criar a nova tabela consolidada
CREATE TABLE teste.cancel_final AS
SELECT 
    -- Colunas de identificação básica
    base.cnpj,
   --base.malhas,
    
    -- Dados de cadastro utilizados no Python
    cad.nm_razao_social,
    cad.nm_sit_cadastral,
    cad.nm_reg_apuracao,
    cad.cd_cnae,
    cad.cd_cnae1,
    cad.cd_cnae2,
    cad.cd_cnae3,
    cad.tx_outras_cnaes,
    cad.sn_simples_nacional_rfb,
    
    -- Dados de declarações normais (DIME)
    n.nm_reg_apuracao AS regime_normal,
    n.periodos_omissos AS periodos_omissos_normal,
    n.periodos_zerados AS periodos_zerados_normal,
    n.total_periodos AS total_periodos_normal,
    n.periodos_declarados AS periodos_declarados_normal,
    
    -- Dados de declarações do Simples Nacional (PGDAS-D)
    s.nm_reg_apuracao AS regime_simples,
    s.periodos_omissos AS periodos_omissos_simples,
    s.periodos_zerados AS periodos_zerados_simples,
    s.total_periodos AS total_periodos_simples,
    s.periodos_declarados AS periodos_declarados_simples,
    
    -- Dados de recolhimentos (pagamentos)
    rec.quantidade_pagtos,
    rec.valor_pagtos,
    
    -- Dados de suspeitas do score (AGREGADOS)
    COALESCE(score_agg.qt_indicios, 0) AS qt_indicios,
    
    -- Dados de NFes (CORREÇÃO AQUI: Ajustado para os nomes corretos das colunas)
    COALESCE(n.nfes_emitidas_normal, s.nfes_emitidas_simples, 0) AS total_nfes_emitidas,
    
    -- NFes Recebidas
    COALESCE(nfr.total_nfes_recebidas, 0) AS total_nfes_recebidas
    
FROM teste.cancel_cnpj base
LEFT JOIN teste.cancel_cadastro cad 
    ON base.cnpj = cad.cnpj
LEFT JOIN teste.cancel_zero_normal n 
    ON base.cnpj = n.cnpj_base
LEFT JOIN teste.cancel_zero_simples s 
    ON base.cnpj = s.cnpj_base
LEFT JOIN teste.cancel_recolhimento rec 
    ON base.cnpj = rec.cnpj
    
-- Dados agregados de suspeitas
-- (CORREÇÃO AQUI: Usar COUNT(*) pois a tabela 'cancel_suspeitas_score' tem uma linha por indício)
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        cnpj,
        COUNT(*) AS qt_indicios
    FROM teste.cancel_suspeitas_score
    GROUP BY cnpj
) score_agg ON base.cnpj = score_agg.cnpj

LEFT JOIN (
    -- Subquery para obter os dados de NFes recebidas
    SELECT 
        cb.cnpj,
        COUNT(DISTINCT chave) AS total_nfes_recebidas
    FROM teste.cancel_cnpj cb
    LEFT JOIN nfe.nfe n ON 
        REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(n.procnfe.nfe.infnfe.dest.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '') = 
        REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(CAST(cb.cnpj AS STRING)), '[^0-9]', '')
    WHERE (n.ano_emissao * 100 + n.mes_emissao) IN (202511, 202510, 202509, 202508, 202507, 202506, 202505, 202504)
    GROUP BY cb.cnpj
) nfr ON base.cnpj = nfr.cnpj;", "statementsList": ["-- Remover a tabela final se existir
